title: WTB: Chance portrait PSA 4 - Yellow or Red
author: mart8081

posts.post_title: WTB: Chance portrait PSA 4 - Yellow or Red
posts.post_content:
Working on a project for my Dad and would like to add a Chance portrait in PSA 4 to complete an Evers-Chance-Tinker combo.

Many thanks
Martin

Hi Martin,
My name is Charlie Temple and a new member for a couple weeks. I have an extra SGC 50 (4) Chance Yellow Portrait I am willing to sell. $230 including shipping.  I accept Paypal and MO.  Since I'm new, I can give you the name of a friend that has been a longer member for reference if you like.
Send me a PM if interested and we can go from there with info.
Pics attached.

Regards,
Charlie

Charlie,

Thanks for the offer - it is a great looking card, but I am really looking for a PSA graded example as this will fit with my PSA examples of Evers and Tinker. 

Martin
